divs: sighting detailsgoing home. at about 9pm central. on zero street in fort\smith almost in barling. 3 bright orange-white-yellow? lights in a triangle shape appeared above our car about 800 yards in the air approaching from the south. we thought it was a missile or meteor about to hit us. but the object stayed hovering in the air. we were shocked at the brightness of it. and we both wondered out loud "what is that". no sound, object lowered and rose and veered off at an angle. continuing to rise the lights turned out. we followed with our eyes approx. where it should be and saw it light up again about a half-mile ahead and higher. it seemed to be tailing two warthogs that were doing night maneuvers at local airbase. we pulled over and never saw the object again. the two warthogs split way off in the distance and circled back towards fort smith. we went home. stayed out side a bit and watched the warthogs do several touch and takeoff maneuvers, but that is all we saw of the triangular lights. flares? craft? the lights came on suddenly, kind of like lights at a baseball field. and seemed to be a solid object that could control itself.
Summary: 3 bright lights in triangle shape appeared above car as driving, lowered, and rose and disappeared.
